mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select * from eventboard order by EV_RE_REF desc, EV_RE_SEQ asc) b ) where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <= #{end}
mapper.update: update eventboard set EV_READCOUNT = EV_READCOUNT+1 where EV_NO = #{number}
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(EV_NO), 0) + 1 from eventboard
insert into eventboard (EV_NO, EV_SORT, EV_NAME, EV_PASS, EV_TITLE, EV_CONTENT, EV_FILE, EV_ORIGINAL EV_RE_REF, EV_RE_LEV, EV_RE_SEQ, EV_READCOUNT, EV_DATE) values (#{EV_NO}, #{EV_SORT},#{EV_NAME}, #{EV_PASS}, #{EV_TITLE},#{EV_CONTENT}, #{BOARD_FILE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BOARD_ORIGINAL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EV_NO}, #{EV_RE_LEV}, #{EV_RE_SEQ}, #{EV_READCOUNT}, sysdate)
